short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click Toggle for Web Page Dark Mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Dimmer" Offers a Convenient Dark Mode Experience. With one click, your browser interface instantly switches to a dark theme, effectively reducing eye strain while adding a touch of mystery and elegance to your browsing. This extension is highly compatible with the vast majority of websites, ensuring you enjoy dark mode without missing any important information. Install now and embark on your dark mode journey!

❇️ It's compact, with less than 3KB of core code implementation.
❇️ Lightweight, it has no dependencies and only uses native CSS for implementation.
❇️ Safe and discreet, it only requires permission to read TAB page information for style injection and does not access any other permissions or information.
❇️ Free forever, it's an open-source project where you can view the latest source code anytime.
❇️ The original intention behind creating it was for my own use due to my dry eyes and frequent night browsing. Later, I published it on the Chrome Store, hoping to bring convenience to those who need it.
long.zh_CN:
「关灯」提供便捷的暗黑模式体验。一键开启后，您的浏览器界面将瞬间切换为深色主题，有效减轻眼部疲劳，同时为您的浏览增添一份神秘与优雅。该扩展兼容性强，适用于绝大多数网站，确保您在享受暗黑模式的同时，不会错过任何重要信息。立即安装，开启您的暗黑模式之旅吧！
          
❇️ 他足够小，核心代码实现只有不到 3KB
❇️ 轻量化，他没有任何依赖，仅使用原生 CSS 实现
❇️ 安全并且谨慎，仅获取读取 TAB 页面信息权限，用于注入样式。不会获取任何其他的权限和信息
❇️ 永久免费，这是一个开源项目，随时可以查看最新的源代码
❇️ 制作他的初衷是我有干眼症并且经常晚上浏览页面，自己需要这样的一个工具，后来发布到 Chrome 商店。希望可以方便到有需要的朋友
